resources.name: List Transactions
resources.description:
Listing Transaction

[GET] Route for list all transactions inside DB

### All fields to send are mandatory None ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 200 OK** ```response [ { "id": "3911ac1e-f7eb-4015-894f-1cf4d6279f7f", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "10.00", "destinationCurrency": "BRL", "resultValue": "55.81", "rate": "5.5810", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "deletedAt": null, "user": { "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41", "email": "admin@mail.com", "password": "$2y$10$yhNAYgXZjtUvgArKO9h/O.s30.YlhLnHWKhxHJ6fDjlenBTUN7d4G", "name": "Administrator", "isAdm": true, "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "deletedAt": null } }, { "id": "48658a85-75d5-4247-8456-433b6ae9537f", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "100.00", "destinationCurrency": "USD", "resultValue": "107.01", "rate": "1.0701", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:56:22.171Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:56:22.171Z", "deletedAt": null, "user": { "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41", "email": "admin@mail.com", "password": "$2y$10$yhNAYgXZjtUvgArKO9h/O.s30.YlhLnHWKhxHJ6fDjlenBTUN7d4G", "name": "Administrator", "isAdm": true, "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "deletedAt": null } }, { "id": "0504ceb4-9571-4a41-9dfe-b91351289fc7", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "1000.00", "destinationCurrency": "JPY", "resultValue": "140633.51", "rate": "140.6335", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z", "deletedAt": null, "user": { "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41", "email": "admin@mail.com", "password": "$2y$10$yhNAYgXZjtUvgArKO9h/O.s30.YlhLnHWKhxHJ6fDjlenBTUN7d4G", "name": "Administrator", "isAdm": true, "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "deletedAt": null } } ] ```

resources.name: Transactions
resources.description:
Transaction Folder

Routes made for transaction section, can create, list all transactions and list specific user transaction.

resources.name: Coin_conversor
resources.description:
Project Conversor

Developer by Lucas Mitori, created to demonstrate some knownledge regarding the nodejs / typescript, API designed to convert currency based on EUR to other coins like GBP, BRL, JPY and USD.

resources.name: List User Transactions
resources.description:
Listing User Transaction

[GET] Route for list all transactions for one user, inside DB

### All fields to send are mandatory None ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 200 OK** ```response [ { "id": "3911ac1e-f7eb-4015-894f-1cf4d6279f7f", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "10.00", "destinationCurrency": "BRL", "resultValue": "55.81", "rate": "5.5810", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "deletedAt": null }, { "id": "48658a85-75d5-4247-8456-433b6ae9537f", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "100.00", "destinationCurrency": "USD", "resultValue": "107.01", "rate": "1.0701", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:56:22.171Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:56:22.171Z", "deletedAt": null }, { "id": "0504ceb4-9571-4a41-9dfe-b91351289fc7", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "1000.00", "destinationCurrency": "JPY", "resultValue": "140633.51", "rate": "140.6335", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z", "deletedAt": null } ```

resources.name: Create Transaction
resources.description:
Creating Transaction

[POST] Route for creating transaction using Exchange API (external)

### All fields to send are mandatory
  • originCurrency - type: string
  • valueCurrency - type: number
  • destinationCurrency - type: string
**Example** ```json { "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": 1000, "destinationCurrency": "JPY" } ``` ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 201 Created** ```response { "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": 1000, "destinationCurrency": "JPY", "resultValue": 140633.507, "rate": 140.633507, "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "user": { "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41", "email": "admin@mail.com", "password": "passwordSpace", "name": "Administrator", "isAdm": true, "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "deletedAt": null }, "deletedAt": null, "id": "0504ceb4-9571-4a41-9dfe-b91351289fc7", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:57:44.952Z" } ```

resources.name: Delete Transaction
resources.description:
Delete Transaction

[DEL] Route for deleting one transaction inside DB

### All fields to send are mandatory write in the URL BASE the specific id of the transaction ```json "{{ _.baseURL }}/transactions/97c777ad-85c5-4f02-9e6b-b3d8bbf2fe24" ``` ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 204 NO CONTENT** ```response {} ```

resources.name: Login User
resources.description:
Login

[POST] Route for login.

### All fields to send are mandatory
  • email - type: string
  • password - type: string
**Example** ```response { "email":"admin@mail.com", "password": "Adm!n1234" } ``` ### This routes need no certification ### Expected result **STATUS 200 OK** ```json { "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc0FkbSI6dHJ1ZSwiaWF0IjoxNjc2MTM4MDA2LCJleHAiOjE2NzYyMjQ0MDYsInN1YiI6ImRhOGVkMTE4LTA0MGUtNDQ5My1hMmUwLWFlZWNkMWUxOGE0MSJ9.1zimCaYr6MGXPECBgIzNfvy6wgrcrZfcoT_qh6b1o0k", "user": { "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "isAdm": true, "email": "admin@mail.com", "name": "Administrator", "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41" } } ```

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
Login Folder

Login section design only for make login using your credentials

resources.name: Register User
resources.description:
Register an User

[POST] Route for register an user

### All fields to send are mandatory
  • email - type: string
  • passwor - type: string
  • name - type: string
**Example** ```json { "email": "lucas.mitori@hotmail.com", "password": "Panda1801", "name": "Lucas Mitori Administrator" } ``` ### This routes need no certification ### Expected result **STATUS 201 Created** ```response { "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:53:23.729Z", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:53:23.729Z", "isAdm": false, "email": "lucas.mitori@hotmail.com", "name": "Lucas Mitori Administrator", "id": "1e141e13-ac55-4d64-bd00-4afc0495f4b1" } ```

resources.name: User
resources.description:
User Folder

User section, routes for all possibles ways regarding user interface. Able to create, delete, patch and list user.

resources.name: List Users
resources.description:
List All Users

[GET] Route for listing all users inside DB

### All fields to send are mandatory None **Example** ```json {} ``` ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 200 OK** ```response [ { "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "isAdm": true, "email": "admin@mail.com", "name": "Administrator", "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41" }, { "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T19:53:23.729Z", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T19:53:23.729Z", "isAdm": false, "email": "lucas.mitori@hotmail.com", "name": "Lucas Mitori Administrator", "id": "1e141e13-ac55-4d64-bd00-4afc0495f4b1" } ] ```

resources.name: List Specific User
resources.description:
List Specific Users

[GET] Route for listing one user inside DB, it comes with all the transactions regarding this user.

### All fields to send are mandatory None **Example** ```json {} ``` ### This routes need certification ### Expected result **STATUS 200 OK** ```response { "id": "da8ed118-040e-4493-a2e0-aeecd1e18a41", "email": "admin@mail.com", "password": "$2y$10$yhNAYgXZjtUvgArKO9h/O.s30.YlhLnHWKhxHJ6fDjlenBTUN7d4G", "name": "Administrator", "isAdm": true, "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:43:30.136Z", "deletedAt": null, "transaction": [ { "id": "3911ac1e-f7eb-4015-894f-1cf4d6279f7f", "originCurrency": "EUR", "valueCurrency": "10.00", "destinationCurrency": "BRL", "resultValue": "55.81", "rate": "5.5810", "dateTime": "2023-02-11", "createdAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "updatedAt": "2023-02-11T17:54:20.100Z", "deletedAt": null } ] } ```
